titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Los Angeles Lakers for winning the 2020 National Basketball Association Championship.
A resolution congratulating the Los Angeles Lakers for winning the 2020 National Basketball Association Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the Los Angeles Lakers for winning the 2020 National Basketball Association Championship.
